The complexity of this view is considered medium due to the following factors:
It involves multiple joins across five tables, which increases the complexity of understanding and maintaining the view.
The logic includes several conditions that ensure data consistency across billing periods and revisions.
The view does not include any subqueries or complex calculations, which keeps the complexity from being high.
